thread.section_title: Hiberia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: excellent hotel brilliant location round the corner from trevi fountain
thread.title_full: excellent hotel brilliant location round the corner from trevi fountain - Review of Hiberia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jap1023
title: excellent hotel brilliant location round the corner from trevi fountain
text:
location brilliant rooms spacious clean towels and pillow cases each day , easy walking distance to every attraction near bus route , drinks and mini bar excellent prices i euro bottle water , spirits and wine also reasonable, in the bar area, free unlimited wi fi and safe, only downfall is a 4 slice toaster that takes ages could do with another and possibly a flask of hot water for the tea as queue for the coffee machine which has a number of choices soon becomes busy , the reception staff and the bar person were also brilliant
Room Tip: room 216 nice not many of the rooms have veiw except the top foors on the corner they overlook the... See more room tips
